Ship - Class in game
Describes a charecter called ship that the player holds.

Ship.Bullets - Class in game
Inner class that gives the ship the ability too have its own bullet object.
shoot(Graphics) - Method in class game.Aliens.EnemyBullets
Moves the bullet too the coordinates of its alien object and adjust so it looks like the bullet is leaving the alien.
shoot(Graphics) - Method in class game.Ship.Bullets
Checks if the bullet is off screen and if it is it changes the position of the bullet to the same position as the ship.
